changes.description: Overhauled to a single-level 40% commission model. Added minimum 3 active referral requirement for withdrawals from referral balance. Implemented stepwise (1-3) progress UI.
Reduced profit lock cycle from 60 to 30 days. Daily profits from tasks now credit to a locked wallet. Added 'Claim' functionality for locked funds post-cycle.

Added 'lockedBalance' and 'referralBalance' fields. Rearchitected withdrawals to remove persistent wallet numbers; destination numbers are now provided per request. Added source selection (Main/Referral).
Added 'dailyReward' to package schema to enable dynamic task profit calculation.
Redesigned Team page as 'Referral Hub'. Added 'Referral' tab to bottom navigation. Enhanced payment method selection with prominent branding and icons.
